# Jupyter Notebook checkpoints
.ipynb_checkpoints/

# Python cache and compiled files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class

# Environment folders (if any local envs are created)
env/
venv/
.conda/
.venv/

# Conda environment YAML file - you want to keep this, so NOT ignored
# environment.yml

# pip requirements file - also keep this, so NOT ignored
# requirements.txt

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Editor config files (optional, but usually safe to ignore)
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
